title: Pi Day
content: Not wanting [it](http://worldgame.blogspot.com/2012/03/pi-day-2012.html) to go by without mention even though blogging by cell from the airport is tedious.  I'm waiting for Tara to arrive and that's fun and interesting.  What about e Day?  I would it be an e Minute:  Feb 7, 1 hour 8th minute.  True, wrong base, but then so is 3.14.
author: Kirby Urner
